channel.title: Mobile site
channel.description: hey i dont know if its just for me or if its for everyone, but i'm on my ipod touch right now on safari and everytime you click "menu" in the top right corner it just brings you to the bottom of the page... so didnt know if that is an error or not. but if it is hoped this helped
